description.ko: 유기적 생명체와 디지털 기술이 교차하는 지점에 대한 선구적인 탐구로, 신비로운 플로라-9 구역에서 코드와 빛을 통해 자연이 진화하는 모습을 담고 있습니다.
description.en: A visionary exploration of the intersection between organic life and digital technology, where nature evolves through code and light in the mysterious FLORA-9 sector.

prompt: Ultra-detailed 3D render of FLORA-9, a digital ecosystem featuring bioluminescent alien plants with fiber-optic stems and holographic translucent petals. Integrated circuit patterns visible on the leaves, neon energy pulses flowing like sap through crystalline structures, set in a dark surreal landscape with floating data particles and soft bokeh, 8k resolution, ray-tracing, cinematic lighting.
